title: Unresponsive app when joining public chat

labels.name: priority 1: high
labels.description: an issue that is extremely important to fix, that interferes with the majority of users, occurs ofte

body:
# Bug Report

## Description

When public chat is joined for the first time the app becomes unresponsive.

## Steps to reproduce

1. remove Status data folder
2. create new account
3. join #test public channel
4. write the message (not sure if this is needed)

### Additional Information

There is some infinite loop there, output is spammed with ton of `messageByMessageID` and `emojiReactionsByChatIDMessageID`:
